1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abLiteral,
8    -- * Message
9    nothing,
10    missPairTerm,
11    oddRelation,
12    quoteType,
13    reqFlatName,
14    reqRelTuple,
15    reqTermName,
16    unkBracket,
17    unkContent,
18    unkType,
19    -- * Utility
20    expectActual,
21    expect2Actual,
22  ) where
23
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base            as B
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax          as S
26
27-- | Abortable scope for literal.
28abLiteral :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => B.Abortable cp b
29abLiteral = B.abortable "literal"
30
31-- | Nothing
32nothing :: B.Ab a
33nothing = B.leftBecause "Nothing"
34
35-- | Missing pairing term
36missPairTerm :: B.Ab a
37missPairTerm = B.leftBecause "Missing pairing term"
38
39-- | Odd relation literal
40oddRelation :: Int -> Int -> B.Ab a
41oddRelation e a  = B.leftLines "Odd relation literal"
42                        $ expectActual (len e) (len a)
43    where len n = show n ++ " contents"
44
45-- | Quoted type name
46quoteType :: String -> B.Ab a
47quoteType = B.leftLine "Quoted type name"
48
49-- | Require flat name
50reqFlatName :: S.Token -> B.Ab a
51reqFlatName tok = B.leftLine "Require flat name" n where
52    n = S.tokenContent tok
53
54-- | Require tuple in list
55reqRelTuple :: B.Ab a
56reqRelTuple = B.leftBecause "Require tuple in list"
57
58-- | Require term name
59reqTermName :: B.Ab a
60reqTermName = B.leftBecause "Require term name"
61
62-- | Unknown bracket
63unkBracket :: B.Ab a
64unkBracket = B.leftBecause "Unknown bracket"
65
66-- | Unknown content
67unkContent :: B.Ab a
68unkContent = B.leftBecause "Unknown content"
69
70-- | Unknown type name
71unkType :: String -> B.Ab a
72unkType = B.leftLine "Unknown type name"
73
74-- | Expect and actual.
75expectActual :: String -> String -> [String]
76expectActual e a       = [ "Expect " ++ e
77                         , "Actual " ++ a ]
78
79-- | Expect (2 lines) and actual.
80expect2Actual :: String -> String -> String -> [String]
81expect2Actual e1 e2 a  = [ "Expect " ++ e1
82                         , "       " ++ e2
83                         , "Actual " ++ a ]
84
